1.title: Karl vs Pophorn's Tower
1.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat microwave popcorn with lots of margarine. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the revengeful magical viking Pophorn on his Viking Tower, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation.

2.title: Karl vs Dr. Topenheimer
2.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to poor lots of unhealthy toppings on his dessert. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the genius-villain Dr. Topenheimer at his own distant planet, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation.

3.title: Karl vs Karnak
3.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat sugary candy-sweets. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the pharaophic-villain Karnak at his pyramids, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation.

4.title: Mustard West's Special
4.plot: Special episode revealing a bit of Mustard West's past and an exclusive interview with the villain.

5.title: Karl vs Cake Pig
5.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat a big chocolate cakes. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the disgusting Cake Pig at the Farty Forest, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation.

6.title: Karl vs Almondegone
6.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat lots of greasy meatballs. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the powerful Almondegone at the dark alleys of his neighborhood, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation.

7.title: Fritto's Special
7.plot: Special episode revealing a bit of Frittos' past and an exclusive interview with the villain.

8.title: Karl vs Rokchoc's Track
8.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat lots of unhealthy foods on a buffet. Our hero Karl will have to defeat many villains on an awesome car racing competition, helping young Jonny to avoid all these unhealthy temptations.

9.title: Karl vs Many Kandy
9.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat lots of candies. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the crazy Many Kandy at his Candy Castle on Candyland.

10.title: Churrelvis' Special
10.plot: Special episode revealing a bit of Churrelvis' past and an exclusive interview with the villain.

11.title: Karl vs Jelly Monster
11.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat sugary jelly on his bread. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the strong Jelly Monster on a Video-Game-Style-Fighting-Game, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation on his meal.

12.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to poor lots of fattening mayonnaise on his bread. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the out-of-the-box Mayonegger at his war trenches, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation on his meal.

13.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat lots of white chocolates. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the powerful villain Crazy Choko on the Chocolate Waterfall Temple, helping young Jonny to avoid this unhealthy temptation on his meal.

1.title: Karl vs Sodabot
1.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to drink an orange artificial soda. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the powerful villain Sodabot and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

2.title: Karl vs Burger Fred
2.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat a big hamburger. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the agile villain Burger Fred on a video-game style competition and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

3.title: Karl vs Hot Doug
3.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat a hot dog. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the fast and furious villain Hot Doug on a car race duel and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

4.title: Karl vs Mustard West
4.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat with lots of mustard on his food. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the villain Mustard West on a duel at the Old West and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

5.title: Karl vs Icey
5.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat an ice cream with lots of unhealthy toppings. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the villain Icey in a clever way and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

6.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat cotton candy. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the villain Biggy in his amusement park and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

7.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat pizzas. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the villains Gladipizzas at their Coliseum and avoid these unhealthy temptations.

8.plot: Little Jonny will be tempted to eat microwave popcorn. Our hero Karl will have to defeat the villain Super Popcorn on a powerful duel and avoid this unhealthy temptation.

imdb.plot outline: We all have the desire of eating unhealthy foods. So it is with the young JONNY. Lucky him to have the cool strawberry hero KARL around to save him from these temptations. Each episode KARL must fight against powerful and incredible food-villains.
